name: Adna (Erwange)
description:
Adna is an contemplative/ adventure game in a snowy environment in wich you control an old spirit in quest of her lost story. 

In  this game you will need to resolve some enigma in order to explore all the world and find all the memory fragment hidden in it.

This Game is our second year final project at Creajeux.

Our team, Fog Studio:

Programmers :

Sylvain FRAPPEZ

Erwan GEROT

Quentin GUILBAUT

Jean-Baptiste COMTE

Cédric JARNO
